T02D1751:153b-7: bi pr'a bha su kham pram sya so ka rth'a nam /
T02D1751:153b-9: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a na'm /
T02D1751:153b-10: a'a dya nu tpanan tv'a ta /
T02D1751:153b-11: aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1751:153b-12: zhes gtso bo'i gtor ma dang ;
T02D1751:153b-14: aom h'a r'i tyee yakshi n+yi /
T02D1751:153b-17: pa ya tstsha ba sv'a h'a /
T02D1751:153b-18: aom pri yam k'a r'a ya sv' ah'a /
T02D1751:153b-19: aom badzra ya ksh'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1751:153b-20: zhes pas chang bu dang bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1751:153b-21: de nas slar yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D1751:153b-22: de nas gtor ma rnams gshegs pa'am mi gshegs pa'o //
T02D1751:153b-23: slob ma la dbang bskur ba brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1751:153b-24: de'i rjes su slob ma rnams brgyan par byas nas me tog gi phreng ba rnams bzung ste /
T02D1751:153b-25: pus mo sa la btsugs nas sngags kyi tshul byung
T02D1751:153b-26: ba nyid la bsod nams 'dod pa kha cig dkyil
T02D1751:153b-28: 'jig rten pha rol nyer brten pa'i //
T02D1751:153b-29: dad pa mang du byas nas ni //
T02D1751:153b-32: zhes rjes su bstan nas sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su bya'o //
T02D1751:153b-33: de nas de rnams kho na bla ma la gsol ba 'debs su gzhug go //
T02D1751:153b-34: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02D1751:153b-35: mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba ltar //
T02D1751:153b-36: bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir //
T02D1751:153b-37: nam mkha'i rdo rje dang gsol kyi //
T02D1751:153b-38: zhes gsol ba gdab pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma
T02D1751:153b-39: rnams par 'dud pa la mi bskyod pa'i gzugs su
T02D1751:153b-40: dmigs nas / rang gi rig ma skyes bu rdo
T02D1751:153b-41: rje can du bsams nas rdo rjes sems su rab
T02D1751:153b-42: tu bsgoms pas khor yug gi bum pas brgyad kyi
T02D1751:153b-44: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis bsum pa'i chu blangs nas /
T02D1751:153b-45: dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni //
T02D1751:153b-46: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa ;
T02D1751:153b-47: / gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung //
T02D1751:153b-48: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par byed //
T02D1751:153b-49: aom badzra au da ka aa bhi shinytsa h'um zhes
T02D1751:153b-50: slob ma 'khor los sgyur ba lta bur dbang bskur
T02D1751:153b-51: bar bya'o // chu'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga me long ye shes so //
T02D1751:154a-0: de nas bshad ma thag pa la @154a * //
T02D1751:154a-1: sogs pa'i rim pas gser ram gos las byas pa'i cod pan slob ma'i mgo la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1751:154a-2: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rab tu sbyor ba las
T02D1751:154a-3: nam mkha'i mthil du son pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1751:154a-4: thams cad rigs kyi bdag po'i gzugs kyis cod pan
T02D1751:154a-5: kho nar gnas par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1751:154a-6: aom aa: badzra mu ku ta aa bhi shi nytsa h'um su ra ta stvam aa ham /
T02D1751:154a-7: zhes pas cod pan blta bar bya'o //
T02D1751:154a-8: slar yang cod pan gyi gnas su aom badzra rdh'a tv'a sha ti aa bhi shi nytsa h'um /
T02D1751:154a-14: 'dis nang gi padma 'dab brgyad kyi phyogs su gnas pa'i lha mo brjod pa rnams dang /
T02D1751:154a-15: dbus kyi gos dkar mo ni rdo rje dbyings kyi
T02D1751:154a-16: dbang phyug mar shes par bya'o zhes pas mnyam pa
T02D1751:154a-17: nyid ye shes te cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba'o
T02D1751:154a-18: // de nas rdo rje chen po rtse mo lnga
T02D1751:154a-19: pa snying ga la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su bzhag
T02D1751:154a-20: nas lag pa g-yas pas gtad par bya'o //
T02D1751:154a-21: slob ma rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'jig
T02D1751:154a-22: rten dbang phyug gi rnam pa la gtad par bya'o
T02D1751:154a-23: // sangs rgyas rdo rje dbang bskur la //
T02D1751:154a-24: de ring khyod la dbang bskur gyur //
T02D1751:154a-25: sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgrub phyir ;
T02D1751:154a-26: / rdo rje 'di de khyod kyis gzung //
T02D1751:154a-27: zhes bklags nas lag pa g-yas su rdo rje sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1751:154a-28: so sor rtog pa ye shes rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1751:154a-29: de nas don yod grub pa'i gzugs kyis dril bu lag pa g-yon du byin nas /
T02D1751:154a-30: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam /
T02D1751:154a-31: aa bhi shinyts'a mi ti shatha sa ma ya stvam /
T02D1751:154a-32: zhes bklags nas lag pa g-yon du ste dril bu'i
T02D1751:154a-33: dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bya ba nan tan gyi
T02D1751:154a-34: ye shes so // de nas slob ma rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D1751:154a-35: mgo bor rdo rje dril bu byin te /
T02D1751:154a-38: badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta:/
T02D1751:154a-39: kye dpal gti mug rdo rje /
T02D1751:154a-40: kye dpal zhes sdang rdo rje /
T02D1751:154a-41: zhes ming gi dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes pa la
T02D1751:154a-42: sogs pa rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i ming gi
T02D1751:154a-43: dbang bskur ro // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
T02D1751:154b-0: mngon par @154b dbang bskur ba lnga po 'di rnams
T02D1751:154b-1: kyis kyang slob ma sngags dang rgyud nyan pa dang
T02D1751:154b-2: bshad pa dang sgrub pa la dbang bar byas par
T02D1751:154b-3: 'gyur ro // dbang bskur ba lnga po rig pa'i dbang bskur ba zhes brjod par bya ste /
T02D1751:154b-4: thams cad du spyan ma la sogs pa'i rig ma rnam kyis bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1751:154b-5: de'i bar ma chad par 'dul bas slob ma don du gnyer ba dang ldan pa la /
T02D1751:154b-6: bla mas slob dpon gyi dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D1751:154b-8: gang gi bdag gi khyod drin las //
T02D1751:154b-9: rang dang gzhan don nus 'gyur ba //
T02D1751:154b-10: rdo rje slob dpon gyi ni dbang //
T02D1751:154b-11: thugs rje'i gter gyis bdag la stsol ;
T02D1751:154b-12: / zhes gsol ba 'debs pa dang ldan pa'i slob
T02D1751:154b-13: ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa steng du gdugs
T02D1751:154b-14: dang rgyal mtshan dang bla re la sogs pas brgyan
T02D1751:154b-15: / shar gyi sgor seng ge'i khri la gnas pa
T02D1751:154b-16: sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du rdo
T02D1751:154b-17: rje sems dpa'i gzugs su dmigs nas h'um yig las
T02D1751:154b-18: skyes pa'i rdo rjer bsams nas /
T02D1751:154b-19: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D1751:154b-20: rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba che //
T02D1751:154b-21: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D1751:154b-22: rdo rje ba snyems pa'i bdag po bdag / dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu khyed //
T02D1751:154b-23: ces de kho na nyid kyis gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1751:154b-25: a'a:yig las skyes pa'i dril bu //
T02D1751:154b-26: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1751:154b-27: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad //
T02D1751:154b-28: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D1751:154b-29: byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed //
T02D1751:154b-30: ces pas lag pa g-yon du sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1751:154b-32: yid kyi lus ni brtan pa'i phyir //
T02D1751:154b-33: phyag rgya'i dam tshig rab tu brjod //
T02D1751:154b-34: gang gi lus ni thams cad brtan //
T02D1751:154b-35: des na phyag rgya rab tu grags //
T02D1751:154b-36: zhes pa 'dis rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i sku ru
T02D1751:154b-37: nang gi bdag nyid can gyi phyag rgya chen po
T02D1751:154b-38: lhag par gnas pa la 'khyud par bya'o //
T02D1751:154b-39: de'i rjes su slob dpon rang gi snying ga'i sa
T02D1751:154b-40: bon las byung ba nam mkha' gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs
T02D1751:154b-41: kyis mngon par dbang bskur bzhin par bsam snas /
T02D1751:154b-42: dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni //
T02D1751:154b-43: khams gsum pa yi phyag byas pa //
T02D1751:155a-2: sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin par byed //
T02D1751:155a-3: ces mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1751:155a-5: shes rab bcu drug lon pa la //
T02D1751:155a-6: lag pa dag gis yang dag 'khyud //
T02D1751:155a-7: rdo rje dril bu mnyam sbyor las //
T02D1751:155a-9: zhes slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'dod do //
T02D1751:155a-10: de'i ched du slob dpon du dbang bskur ba'i dbang du bya ba de'i ched du byin no //
T02D1751:155a-11: dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang /
T02D1751:155a-12: dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dag pa mdor bsdus nas bshad par bya ste /
T02D1751:155a-13: ltar dkyil 'khor padma zhes su brjod //
T02D1751:155a-14: yid kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste /
T02D1751:155a-15: khang brtsegs zhes pa ye shes te //
T02D1751:155a-16: sems kyi brtsegs pa yang dag bsgreng //
T02D1751:155a-17: phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1751:155a-18: sangs rgyas lnga ru rab tu grags //
T02D1751:155a-19: de phyir rnam par snang mdzad gzugs su dmigs pa'i
T02D1751:155a-20: slob ma la rjes su gnang ba sbyin par bya'o
T02D1751:155a-21: // 'jig rten kun la thams cad nas //
T02D1751:155a-22: dngos grub kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D1751:155a-23: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa //
T02D1751:155a-24: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02D1751:155a-25: chos kyi gnas su rdo rje dang rin chen dang /
T02D1751:155a-26: las dang khro bo'i sgra gcig pa'i tshigs su bcad pas rjes su gnang ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1751:155a-27: de'i rjes su rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa dang //
T02D1751:155a-29: dbugs dbyung ba sbyin no zhes pa rgyan thams cad kyi rjes su 'brangs pa sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1751:155a-30: de ltar slob dpon du dbang bskur bas rdo rje rnam par sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D1751:155a-31: gsang ba gsum gyi dbang bskur bas gsung gi rdo rje yang rnam par sbyang bar bya ste /
T02D1751:155a-32: de lta bu'i rim pas rgyud thams cad la brjod
T02D1751:155a-33: pa'i tshogs dbang bskur dgus grol ba sbyin par bya'o
T02D1751:155a-35: chu dang cod pan rdo rje dang ni dril bu la sogs ming //
T02D1751:155a-36: rigs gsum dam tshig skal ldan slob dpon gsang ba mchog sogs kyis //
T02D1751:155a-37: dbang bskur rnam par dgu po gang gi mtshungs med bsod nams kyis //
T02D1751:155a-38: skyer 'jug srid pa dag pa bla ma tshogs de la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1751:155b-0: zhes pa phyag byas nas @155b dbang bskur ba thams cad thob nas /
T02D1751:155b-1: de nas slob mas lus la sogs pa ci rigs pa'i yon dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1751:155b-2: bla mas kyang zhen pa med pa'i sems kyis blangs nas de la bkra shis brjod par bya'o //
T02D1751:155b-4: bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bkra shis dang //
T02D1751:155b-5: chos dang dge 'dun bkra shis dang //
T02D1751:155b-6: bsod nams 'di kun nyid kyis ni //
T02D1751:155b-7: slob ma rnams kyi bkra shis shog / phun sum tshogs pa mda' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra //
T02D1751:155b-8: 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa //
T02D1751:155b-9: sangs rgyas padmo rgyas pa 'dab 'dra'i spyan mda' ba /
T02D1751:155b-10: bkra shis de ni khyod la zhi bar byed gyur
T02D1751:155b-11: cig / de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab
T02D1751:155b-12: mi g-yo ba // 'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa //
T02D1751:155b-13: chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnam sla zhi byed pa //
T02D1751:155b-14: de ni khyod la 'jig rten bkra shis gnyis pa'o //
T02D1751:155b-15: dge 'dun dam pa'i chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis
T02D1751:155b-16: phyug / mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyis
T02D1751:155b-17: mchod pa'i gnas // tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tshar shes dang dpal gyi gzhi //
T02D1751:155b-18: de ni khyod la 'jig rten bkra shis gsum pa'o //
T02D1751:155b-19: zhes slob ma rnams la bkra shis sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1751:155b-21: / de nas slob ma de rnams re re nas rim pas phyag 'tshal nas 'gror gzhug go //
T02D1751:155b-22: de nas bla ma slar yang mchod pa dang bstod pa brjod pa la sogs pa thams cad bya'o //
T02D1751:155b-23: gzhan yang thig le'i rnal 'byor la sogs pa bsgom
T02D1751:155b-24: par bya ba'i thabs su bshad pa'i cho gas byas
T02D1751:155b-25: nas gcig gam lnga'am bdun nam lnga bcu'am /
T02D1751:155b-26: brgyad lhag pa'i brgyar gtor ma byin nas mchod pa
T02D1751:155b-27: byas te dkyil 'khor dang dkyil 'khor gyi dbang po'i
T02D1751:155b-28: lha rnams bzod par mdzod cing bzod par mdzod cig
T02D1751:155b-29: ces brjod nas dkyil 'khor la bskor ba byas te
T02D1751:155b-31: slar yang nye bar 'dug ste yang dag par bstod
T02D1751:155b-32: nas badzra mu: zhes bzlas te rol mo'i sgras gtor
T02D1751:155b-33: ma gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1751:155b-34: dkyil 'khor dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sems
T02D1751:155b-35: dpa'i rang gi ngo bo bdra mu: zhes bklags nas
T02D1751:156a-2: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D1751:156a-3: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D1751:156a-4: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1751:156a-5: aom badzra mu:zhes pas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1751:156a-6: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor rang gi snying ga'i sa bon la rab tu gzhug par bya'o zhes so //
T02D1751:156a-7: dkyil 'khor gyi rdul tshon ni klung gi gnas su rab tu gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1751:156a-8: gzhan nyi ma gnyis pa la rnam thos sras la
T02D1751:156a-9: sogs pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o zhes pa rgyud
T02D1751:156a-11: padma spyan ras gzigs dbang gi / dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i cho ga ni //
T02D1751:156a-13: rgyal dpal ye shes kyis byas pa'i //
T02D1751:156a-14: bsod nams de las skye dgur bcas //
T02D1751:156a-15: rtag tu skye dgu bde ldan 'gyur //
T02D1751:156a-16: bdag kyang bsod nams 'di yis ni //
T02D1751:156a-17: kun mkhyen go 'phang thob gyur cig / ces pa
T02D1751:156a-18: padma spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi padma dra ba'i
T02D1751:156a-19: rim pas bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i
T02D1751:156a-22: // / rgyal ba dpal ye shes ming gzhan padma rdo rje zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1751:156a-25: // / kha che'i pandi ta chen po su ma na shr'i bha dra dang /
